1386720.name: Domynyo
1386720.description:
Domynyo is a multiplayer online game based on a variety of playable modalities.
We aim to present a realistic graphics and fascinating gameplay based on fictional and visionary (fully customizable) vehicles, items, accessories and weapons.

Let’s talk about the game! Domynyo is playable both in First Person and Third Person, depending on players preferences. Domynyo is NOT a pay to win. The player will be able to purchase in-game content but that won’t give any sort of advantages, it will just make your character look more pretty (if you have good taste)!

MAIN THEMES AND LOOK?

Post-apocalyptic and Abandoned
environments are the protagonists of the First Season.
Dark environments, debris, creepy locations in a 4k world.

We thought dynamic lightning and weather is a must! The day-night cycle and climate conditions will influence the game to the point that you could find yourself in the dark seeking for a torch and praying for the storm to end (while trying not to get shot)!
1386720.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 日语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 瑞典语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
